00146 #define Register_Class(CLASSNAME) \
00147   static cObject *__FILEUNIQUENAME__() {return new CLASSNAME;} \
00148   EXECUTE_ON_STARTUP(classes.getInstance()->add(new cObjectFactory(opp_typename(typeid(CLASSNAME)),__FILEUNIQUENAME__));)
00149 
00156 // Implementation note: this is basically a Register_Class(), making sure the class subclasses from cModule.
00157 #define Define_Module(CLASSNAME) \
00158   static cObject *__FILEUNIQUENAME__() {cModule *ret = new CLASSNAME; return ret; } \
00159   EXECUTE_ON_STARTUP(classes.getInstance()->add(new cObjectFactory(opp_typename(typeid(CLASSNAME)),__FILEUNIQUENAME__,"module"));)
00160 
00167 // Implementation note: this is basically a Register_Class().
00168 #define Define_Channel(CLASSNAME) \
00169   static cObject *__FILEUNIQUENAME__() {cChannel *ret = new CLASSNAME; return ret; } \
00170   EXECUTE_ON_STARTUP(classes.getInstance()->add(new cObjectFactory(opp_typename(typeid(CLASSNAME)),__FILEUNIQUENAME__, "channel"));)
00171 
00177 #define Register_ClassDescriptor(DESCRIPTORCLASS) \
00178   EXECUTE_ON_STARTUP(classDescriptors.getInstance()->add(new DESCRIPTORCLASS());)

00197 #define Module_Class_Members(CLASSNAME,BASECLASS,STACK)  NOTE_the_deprecated_Module_Class_Members_macro_has_been_removed_in_version_4_0

00199 // internal
00200 #define __REGISTER_CONFIGOPTION(ID, ARGLIST) \
00201   cConfigOption *ID; \
00202   EXECUTE_ON_STARTUP(configOptions.getInstance()->add(ID = new cConfigOption ARGLIST);)
00203 
00209 #define Register_GlobalConfigOption(ID, NAME, TYPE, DEFAULTVALUE, DESCRIPTION) \
00210   __REGISTER_CONFIGOPTION(ID, (NAME, true, cConfigOption::TYPE, NULL, DEFAULTVALUE, DESCRIPTION))
00211 
00217 #define Register_PerRunConfigOption(ID, NAME, TYPE, DEFAULTVALUE, DESCRIPTION) \
00218   __REGISTER_CONFIGOPTION(ID, (NAME, false, cConfigOption::TYPE, NULL, DEFAULTVALUE, DESCRIPTION))
00219 
00226 #define Register_GlobalConfigOptionU(ID, NAME, UNIT, DEFAULTVALUE, DESCRIPTION) \
00227   __REGISTER_CONFIGOPTION(ID, (NAME, true, cConfigOption::CFG_DOUBLE, UNIT, DEFAULTVALUE, DESCRIPTION))
00228 
00235 #define Register_PerRunConfigOptionU(ID, NAME, UNIT, DEFAULTVALUE, DESCRIPTION) \
00236   __REGISTER_CONFIGOPTION(ID, (NAME, false, cConfigOption::CFG_DOUBLE, UNIT, DEFAULTVALUE, DESCRIPTION))
00237 
00243 #define Register_PerObjectConfigOption(ID, NAME, KIND, TYPE, DEFAULTVALUE, DESCRIPTION) \
00244   __REGISTER_CONFIGOPTION(ID, (NAME, cConfigOption::KIND, cConfigOption::TYPE, NULL, DEFAULTVALUE, DESCRIPTION))
00245 
00252 #define Register_PerObjectConfigOptionU(ID, NAME, KIND, UNIT, DEFAULTVALUE, DESCRIPTION) \
00253   __REGISTER_CONFIGOPTION(ID, (NAME, cConfigOption::KIND, cConfigOption::CFG_DOUBLE, UNIT, DEFAULTVALUE, DESCRIPTION))
